Environmental Services

The Council has a number of recycling schemes.

What can be put in your paper recycling bin?

  • Newspapers
  • Magazines
  • Junk mail
  • Blue telephone directories
  • Envelopes (except windowed envelopes)
  • Catalogues
  • Letters and general paper

What can't be put in your paper recycling bin?

  • Cardboard
  • Yellow pages
  • Plastic wrappers
  • General household rubbish

What can be put in my recycling bin?

Plastic Bottles - (please remove lids and squash the bottles)

Clean Plastic Film e.g toilet roll wrapping and carrier bags - (No film that has come into contact with food)

Food and Drinks Cans - (please rinse)

Glass Bottles and Jars - (please rinse)

Any Textiles

Recycling collection dates

To find out when your recycling will be collected us the online form link to online form.
